sentences.sCn: 以灭绝的非洲原始人类。

sentences.sContent: H. erectus is generally believed to be the direct ancestor of modern humans and also the first hominid to live in caves and tame fire.
sentences.sContent_eng: H. erectus is generally believed to be the direct ancestor of modern humans and also the first hominid to live in caves and tame fire.
sentences.sCn: 人们通常认为直立人是现代人的直接祖先，也是第一个生活在洞穴中和学会用火的原始人类。

remMethod.val: homi(=hom人) + nid → 原始人类； 人科动物

words.tran: 回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的

trans.tranOther: a member of a group of animals which includes human beings and also the animals from whom humans developed
